channel.title: NPCs, Please Help, or Just Take a Look
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I have a problem with my NPCs, I made a Warrior's Guild type thing where they just drop tokens and you can use on a chest to buy defenders, but the problem is, my Cyclopes don't re-spawn, I already have a lot of other NPCs that work fine, and I'm a pretty good coder, but I can't find the problem here, I'm using a 667 Loading 708 Source (RsCalifornia)(Credits to Arcik for the source.), and I could really use some help, here's my code, BTW: it's located in npcspawning.java
[code]World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2857, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2862, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2 World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2866, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76 World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2870, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2868, 3546, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2 World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2864, 3546, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76 World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2859, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2857, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2 World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2854, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76 World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2849, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2849, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2 World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2846, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76 World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2843, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2842, 3545, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2 World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2845, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76[/code]
Thanks for the help,
John

item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

some 667’s do this and idk why, it also happens with frost dragons
the code that you have entered is not the problem… unfortunately i don’t know at is the problem

item.title: NPCs, Please Help, or Just Take a Look
item.dc:creator: @johnny1223 johnny1223
item.description:
@johnny1223 wrote:

Hi everyone,

I have a problem with my NPCs, I made a Warrior’s Guild type thing where they just drop tokens and you can use on a chest to buy defenders, but the problem is, my Cyclopes don’t re-spawn, I already have a lot of other NPCs that work fine, and I’m a pretty good coder, but I can’t find the problem here, I’m using a 667 Loading 708 Source (RsCalifornia)(Credits to Arcik for the source.), and I could really use some help, here’s my code, BTW: it’s located in npcspawning.java

   [code]World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2857, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56
	World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2862, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2
	World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2866, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76	
	World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2870, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56
	World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2868, 3546, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2
	World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2864, 3546, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76
	World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2859, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56
	World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2857, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2
	World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2854, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76
	World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2849, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56
	World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2849, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2
	World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2846, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76
	World.spawnNPC(116, new WorldTile(2843, 3547, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56
	World.spawnNPC(4291, new WorldTile(2842, 3545, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 56 - design2
	World.spawnNPC(4292, new WorldTile(2845, 3541, 2), -1, true, true);// Cyclops 76[/code]

Thanks for the help,

John
